pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Etebase - Encrypt Everything

A Python library for EtebaseThis package is implemented in Rust and exposes a Python API for people to use.![GitHub tag](https://img.shields.io/github/tag/etesync/etebase-py.svg)[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/etebase.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/etebase/)[![Build Status](https://github.com/etesync/etebase-py/workflows/Build/badge.svg)](https://github.com/etesync/etebase-py/actions/)[![Chat on freenode](https://img.shields.io/badge/chat-IRC%20|%20Matrix%20|%20Web-blue.svg)](https://www.etebase.com/community-chat/)# DocumentationIn addition to the API documentation, there are docs available at https://docs.etebase.com# Build## Install deps```pip install wheel setuptools setuptools-rust```## Build```python setup.py bdist_wheel```
